name: Next Episode Dark
description:
Keep track of the TV shows you watch
Next Episode is a website dedicated to helping you organize and keep track of your favorite TV shows.
Add the shows you like to a "Watchlist" and let the site take it from there. It'll show you when you have new episodes, and will arrange them nicely in a calendar, will recommend for you some great shows based on what you already watch, offers top charts - with trailers - to discover new shows and much, much more!

Online since 2005, Next Episode knows how to enhance your TV habits. Check out what's inside - join now for free! http://next-episode.net/
